i wanted a small bag that was out-of-the-way that could carry my cell phone and my wallet. this is a good-looking bag that seems well-made and holds my iphone x max and my wallet easily.

fits great on my road bike and my wife's cyclocross bike, doesn't fit on my triathlon bike, but that's because of the frame shape of the bike. has a little mesh pocket to hold phone, wallet, or whatever you wanna put in it. made carrying tools easier
they cycle storage bag is nice. however, it is intended for a male’s cycle. as such, it doesn’t fit exactly as intended. still, i confident in security of fit.

i have bought this storage bag and have installed this weekend on my byke.it feeted perfectly on it, looks nice and now i have extra storage to grab a few things in my rides.the quality of the products did satisfied me. recommend to all.

nice product. looks good on my bike. i can fit my keys and a water bottle and a few other small objects. but you cannot zip it closed one handed. if you open it while riding you will probably have to stop to zip it close.

i've been using this storage bag for several times on my bicycle outings. the capacity is good, and the zipper keeps everything securely stored. the 3-point strap keeps the bag on the frame well. the width does not imped leg movements, but the bag does contact the water bottle that i also placed on the frame. i am happy with the bag and would buy again if needs arise.

this is a nice roomy bike bag. i can get my keys, phone, vape, wallet, bike repair tools in it and still have room! the only thing is, it might be to big for a water bottle on the lower part of your bike with this bag. if your trying to grab it out with the bag on, its pretty hard to do while riding. i usually have to pull over to take a drink because i cant pull it out or put it back in with the bag on. overall i like the bag, but i probably will use a different one if i plan on riding all day and drinking without stopping during my ride.

great for spare tube and bike tools. check the size and where the water bottle holder hits. it works on my son’s 26.5” bike but it’s a snug fit. i have to remove it prior to placing bike on our bike rack. overall, gets the job done!

it appears it will work well. less functional because of my bottle cages. not certain about weatherability in the rain yet. there are no locks. it is very accessible.
have really enjoyed having this storage bag on my bike. easy to install. holds my iphone and car keys easily. lots of room inside the case. quality is good.

had it for about 3 months and it was fine. now the zipper broke. i guess it’s cheap enough that no one should expect real quality.amending my review since i have now fixed the zipper on my own. no big deal. the bag is very useful for carrying small items. only down side is that i have to take it off to load the bike on my rack (a tow hook rack).
the bag looks and feels fine although it is smaller than i pictured. the straps for connecting are not long enough to fit my bike. it is built for the normal round tube framed bike and mine is not.

this is a good storage bag. i use it to store my phone, tools and spare inner tube when i go on long rides. i made this purchase after i went on a 20 mile ride and ended up walking five miles after a nail punctured my rear tire.
i attached this on my 2010 schwinn ranger and it's great. my smartphone (5.5" galaxy note 5), wallet and first-aid kit fit in well with a lot of room to spare. awesome buy and i love it.
i needed this to hold my cell when out for a long ride. it fits nicely within the frame with very little fabric extending beyond the frame tube.

i ordered 2 of these bags for my handcycle. they just arrived today and i transferred all my tools, spair innertubes, goo, etc and have lots of room left for snacks or whatever. they fit perfectly between the drafting bumper and the frame.
mine fell apart after only maybe 8 rides. straps broke and i had to carry it back for a good 5 miles while steering with the other hand. not ideal
neatly tucked in the frame. easy installation and great to store wallets, phones, and keys when biking. fits small 8oz bottles too (tight).

fits my phone, multi tool and spare tube. the only thing is that the water resistance isn't the best... left it out in the rain one night and the things inside got pretty wet. probably can take light rain
plastic buckles broke within a month. waste of money. i emailed customer service and they replied 2 weeks later asking a useless clarifying question and then haven't responded since then.

good product that arrived pretty quick. my bike has a bit larger frame size but this fit fine. quality of the materials is not an issue but i've only had it a week or so by now and just a few rides but would recommend.
great place to stow my phone, wallet and emergency tool. don't even notice it's there when riding. highly recommend it to anyone trail riding

like this for spare inter tubes, gloves, pump, stem tightener etc. and it easily transfers to another bike. just getting into biking and have "learned" the value of spare parts after a couple of flats. now that i have the parts on board, no more flats....go figure ; - )
i've got an older raleigh m40 and it fits very nicely and holds my cell phone, identification, and personal protection i.e. pew pew.
perfect fit for my husband’s bike. looks nice and sleek and flush to the frame. more storage than i imagined.
sometimes, you just need a place to put items besides your pocket. very handy. i was able to fit a run of the mill disposable plastic water bottle in it.
this little storage bag did not disappoint. it attaches securely, has plenty of room for my phone and keys, a packet of tissues, with room to spare.

this little pouch is well made. i am not able to use it because it just doesn't fit on the mountain bike the way i had hoped it would - which is no fault of the product - just make sure you have enough room for it and it will not be interfering with any cables, etc.

i was skeptical if this would suit my needs or not, it has with each of my concerns! would it stay in place - yes. would my legs rub against it - no. would it be to big/small - no. would it hold my sidearm securely while riding, giving me immediate and easy access if needed - yes. i give this item an easy 5 stars!

i found the bag to be a bit wide, causing it to constantly brush up against my leg while riding. hard to attach, and placement in general is just awkward. offers a good amount of storage, but i think saddle bags that attach under the seat are better.

it's much smaller than the picture. and more difficult to store things in it due to it's design. good luck getting a phone in it. if you are lucky that about all you'll get in there. would not recommend.

purchased for my son's birthday. he received it on time and reports to me that he really likes it. i liked the design, as i don't care for under saddle bags that much. i may get one of these for my bikes and remove my seat bags...
i love this it fits on my bmx bike and it works well i do wish there where more pockets for stuff but still is a great item

this seller is outstanding!! both my bicycle items arrived in quick time and in perfect condition. the bike storage bag allows me to put all my pocket stuff in there and leaves me with less discomfort when riding. love this product.

i use this storage bag on my raleigh venture 3.0. it is ideal for carrying my cellphone, id and basic bike tools. bag was very simple to attach to bike frame and does not interfere with pedaling.

i’ve had this on my bike now for a couple months. it’s still holding on good and no signs of coming apart. the only issue i have is zipper placement. it’s very close to the bar so it makes it a little bit of a pain to open and close. not a big deal though. i’d buy it again.

this bag is made rather cheaply. i've been riding with mine for about 2 months and the straps have just about ripped off. luckily i saw it before my last ride so it didn't rip off during one of my ride's. unfortunately i just passed my return window.
a little bigger than was expecting, but does not interfere while peddling. did not like my under-the-seat bag and always was just a little too small. have lots of space now.
+ room for tools, spare inner tube, raincoat, etc.+ light weight+ fits well- zipper seam ripped after a few months of use- be careful to avoid brake cable on some bikes

easy to install obviously. i have plenty of room for my bike tool kit, misc wrenches, phone, wallet, a few little extras if needed. also can fit water bottle, its tight on my mg hitch but it fits.
great for storing bike tools so the pressure is off your back especially if you plan to have a back pack while riding.

very functional for a few small items. looks good too. be aware that you won't be able to install a water bottle cage on the down tube. also need to remove bag for the type of bike rack that i have for my car.

i bought this bag to attach to the handle of my walker so i can carry my iphone, keys, etc. it fits perfectly and works just as i had hoped!
product lasted just over 30 days before one of the seam's ripped almost lost my belongings..not recommended!!
got this bag for my son to use when he goes biking. it's perfect for holding his wallet and cellphone. is also large enough to fit a few more things, if needed.
i love how this product look and functions. i used as soon as i took it out of the package and it holds my cell phone and keys with room to spare. thanks for such a great product.

just the right size to store everything i need. the one velcro strap that attaches to the verticle part of the frame is long enough to allow my bike rack to pass between the bag and frame. very happy with my purchase
not a durable bag as i'd thought it was. cheaply made. put any tool in tupperware then put that in the thing.

pretty much exactly what you would expect. seems plenty sturdy enough and holds enough to make it possible to not wear a backpack for long rides. i can get a mini pump, extra tube, a few tools, wallet, phone and car key into mine without any issue. if you try to go more than that the sides will bulge out so that they brush your legs, but i am glad to have it.

i needed a bag larger than my undersea bag to bring along tools. this is perfect and looks great. very happy with my purchase.

this product is great for what i need while riding for my phone or wallet.most important the shipper reached out to me and replaced this product free of charge when i received my 1st order damaged and followed up on the 2nd order. great customer service
very good size for samsung note phone, wallet & keys. seems well made. fits snug. recommend & plan to buy another for 2nd bike.
great little pouch. i’d like to see a version with an expandable compartment but for now this serves my purpose

decent bag.... just fits on my 15" specialized rockhopper, but i mean just. i have to push it into place while riding. seems like it is probably going to wear out from wearing against the frame.
